title: Release executor
description: Create a release PR with version bumps, changelog, and AI summary

targetBranch.description: Target branch to merge into (production branch)

aiCommand.description: Command to run for AI summary generation (should accept prompt via stdin). Leave empty to skip AI summaries.

aiTitleCommand.description: Command to run for AI title generation (should accept prompt via stdin). Defaults to aiCommand if not specified.

model.description: AI model to use (overrides model in aiCommand if specified). Examples: fast, gpt-4o, sonnet, etc.

maxLinesPerFile.description: Maximum lines per file in diff sent to AI (prevents large files from dominating)

aiTimeout.description: Timeout in seconds for AI generation (prevents hanging). Set to 0 to disable timeout.

autoMerge.description: Enable auto-merge on the PR when CI passes

diffPaths.description: Paths to include in diff for AI analysis

prDescriptionFile.description: Path to a markdown file containing custom PR description. If provided, this will be used instead of the auto-generated description. Example: tmp/pr-description.md
